## ApplicationScale Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The ApplicationScale resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>App<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the application that you want to deploy.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Deploy<wbr>Group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the instance group to which you want to add ECS instances to scale out the application.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Ecu<wbr>Infos</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The IDs of the Elastic Compute Unit (ECU) where you want to deploy the application. Type: List.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Force<wbr>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This parameter specifies whether to forcibly remove an ECS instance where the application is deployed. It is set as true only after the ECS instance expires. In normal cases, this parameter do not need to be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language csharp %}}

<dl class="resources-properties">
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the resulting resource.</dd>
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The <em>unique</em> provider ID of the resource to lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Any extra arguments used during the lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>opts</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>App<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the application that you want to deploy.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Deploy<wbr>Group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the instance group to which you want to add ECS instances to scale out the application.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Ecc<wbr>Info</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ecc information of the resource supplied above. The value is formulated as `<ecc1,ecc2>`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Ecu<wbr>Infos</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The IDs of the Elastic Compute Unit (ECU) where you want to deploy the application. Type: List.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Force<wbr>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This parameter specifies whether to forcibly remove an ECS instance where the application is deployed. It is set as true only after the ECS instance expires. In normal cases, this parameter do not need to be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}


{{% choosable language go %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">
